name: Alan: The AI
description:
Entry for BGM #3

Note: This game was made in 4 days

Controls

A, D/ arrows - movement

W/ arrow - jump

Tools used

Unity

Aseprite

Sfxr

Media

Instagram: theblindeye.developer

Personal site: dascalualexandru.me

The BlindEye site: theblindeye.games

How to Download

Download the.zip folder and locate it on your PC.

Right-click on it and select "Extract All."

This will extract all the game files into a folder on your PC. Activate the executable and enjoy!
